title: React Components Assignment
description: Create and render reusable React components. This assignment focuses on the fundamental concepts of creating and managing React components, including state and props, and how to pass data between them.

title: State and Props Quiz
description: Test your understanding of state and props in React. This quiz covers key concepts such as state management, prop drilling, and the use of functional and class components.

title: React Project
description: Develop a full-fledged React application. This project combines everything you've learned about React, including components, state, props, and routing, into a comprehensive application.

title: Node.js Basics Assignment
description: Learn the basics of Node.js. This assignment covers fundamental Node.js concepts such as module system, asynchronous programming, and building simple HTTP servers.

title: REST API Development
description: Build a RESTful API using Node.js and Express. This assignment focuses on creating CRUD operations, middleware integration, and handling different HTTP methods.

title: Middleware Integration
description: Integrate middleware into your Node.js application. This assignment covers the use of middleware for logging, authentication, error handling, and more.

title: Python Syntax Assignment
description: Get familiar with Python syntax. This assignment covers basic Python constructs such as variables, data types, control structures, functions, and error handling.

title: Data Structures Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Python data structures. This quiz includes questions on lists, dictionaries, sets, tuples, and how to manipulate them.

title: Python Project
description: Create a Python application. This project combines your knowledge of Python syntax, data structures, and algorithms to build a functional Python application.

title: Supervised Learning Assignment
description: Apply supervised learning techniques using Python and TensorFlow. This assignment includes tasks on regression, classification, and model evaluation.

title: Model Evaluation Quiz
description: Quiz on evaluating machine learning models. Topics include precision, recall, F1 score, ROC curves, and confusion matrices.

title: Machine Learning Project
description: Build a machine learning model. This project involves data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment using Python and TensorFlow.

title: SQL Queries Assignment
description: Write complex SQL queries. This assignment covers SELECT statements, joins, subqueries, and aggregate functions.

title: Database Design Quiz
description: Quiz on database design principles. Topics include normalization, ER diagrams, and relational schema design.

title: Advanced SQL Project
description: Develop an advanced SQL-based application. This project involves designing a database schema, writing complex queries, and optimizing performance.

title: HTML Structure Assignment
description: Create the structure of a web page using HTML. This assignment covers elements, attributes, forms, and semantic HTML.

title: CSS Styling Quiz
description: Test your CSS skills. This quiz includes questions on selectors, properties, box model, and responsive design.

title: Responsive Design Project
description: Build a responsive web page. This project involves using CSS and media queries to create a web page that looks good on all devices.

title: JavaScript Basics Assignment
description: Learn the basics of JavaScript. This assignment covers variables, data types, functions, and basic DOM manipulation.

title: DOM Manipulation Quiz
description: Quiz on JavaScript DOM manipulation. Topics include selecting elements, event handling, and dynamic content updates.

title: JavaScript Project
description: Build a JavaScript application. This project combines everything you've learned about JavaScript, including DOM manipulation, event handling, and API interaction.

title: AWS Setup Assignment
description: Set up AWS services. This assignment covers the basics of setting up AWS EC2 instances, S3 buckets, and configuring IAM roles.

title: Cloud Security Quiz
description: Quiz on cloud security principles. Topics include IAM policies, security groups, and best practices for securing AWS resources.

title: Cloud Computing Project
description: Develop a cloud-based application. This project involves using AWS services to deploy a scalable and secure application.
